site_logs.2025-03-01: Site mobilization initiated. Temporary fencing installed.
site_logs.2025-03-02: Clearing and grubbing completed. Leveling work started.
site_logs.2025-03-03: Excavation for foundation pits in progress.
site_logs.2025-03-04: Excavation 75% done. Hit unexpected hard rock layer.
site_logs.2025-03-05: Blasting approved and scheduled. Safety gear checked.
site_logs.2025-03-06: Rock blasting executed. Vibration readings recorded.
site_logs.2025-03-07: Excavation completed. PCC laid for isolated footing areas.
site_logs.2025-03-08: Rebar work started for footings. Bending on-site.
site_logs.2025-03-09: Formwork installation for first batch of footings.
site_logs.2025-03-10: Footing concreting done for grid A and B.
site_logs.2025-03-11: Footing curing ongoing. Rebar stock updated.
site_logs.2025-03-12: Footing inspection by third-party consultant passed.
site_logs.2025-03-15: Plinth concreting completed for south wing.
site_logs.2025-03-19: Material delivery: sand, aggregate, AAC blocks.
site_logs.2025-03-21: 1st floor slab cast. Started water curing.
site_logs.2025-03-22: Rain delay. Water pumped from site.
site_logs.2025-03-26: Concrete strength test results passed for week 2.
site_logs.2025-03-27: 2nd floor columns cast. Plinth painting begun.
site_logs.2025-03-28: Steel truss sample arrived for warehouse roof.
site_logs.2025-03-29: Client site visit. Approved plumbing routing.
site_logs.2025-03-30: Brick wall raised to 2.4m on north side.
site_logs.2025-04-01: Procured GI pipes for rooftop tank.
site_logs.2025-04-02: Rooftop slab design reviewed by consultant.
site_logs.2025-04-03: Slab rebar shifted due to minor layout error. Fixed.
site_logs.2025-04-04: Rooftop slab cast with M30. Extended curing planned.
site_logs.2025-04-05: External plastering on south face begun.
site_logs.2025-04-08: AAC block wall alignment fixed near lift shaft.
site_logs.2025-04-09: Paint mock-up tested. Beige color selected.
site_logs.2025-04-10: Cement storage upgraded. Weatherproof tarp used.
site_logs.2025-04-11: False ceiling frame layout begun in corridor.
site_logs.2025-04-13: Emergency exit stair cover slab cast.
site_logs.2025-04-15: Safety drill conducted for site workers.
site_logs.2025-04-16: Brick joint testing for water ingress.
site_logs.2025-04-17: Solar conduit provisions installed on terrace.
site_logs.2025-04-18: Client requested change in pantry tile spec.
site_logs.2025-04-23: Reinforcement placed for compound wall footing.
site_logs.2025-04-24: Compound wall started. Blockwork up to 1m.
site_logs.2025-04-25: Site power backup tested. DG runtime logged.
site_logs.2025-04-26: Tile laying started in toilet blocks.
site_logs.2025-04-27: Inspection of tile slope by plumbing consultant.
site_logs.2025-04-28: AC drain outlet re-routed from west wall.
site_logs.2025-05-03: Basement lighting switched to LED bulkheads.
site_logs.2025-05-04: Terrace tiling waterproof test in progress.
site_logs.2025-05-07: Kitchen counter granite fixed in flat 101.
site_logs.2025-05-10: Entrance lobby flooring completed with vitrified tiles.
site_logs.2025-05-11: Fire extinguisher brackets installed on all floors.
site_logs.2025-05-14: Lift tested and certified. Label posted.
site_logs.2025-05-15: Final coat of external paint on east fa√ßade.
site_logs.2025-05-16: Compound wall gate erected. Hinges installed.
site_logs.2025-05-18: Main signage frame fixed at entrance.
site_logs.2025-05-19: Final client walkthrough scheduled for Friday.
site_logs.2025-05-21: Furniture delivery by vendor delayed by 1 day.
site_logs.2025-05-23: Client walkthrough complete. Minor remarks noted.
site_logs.2025-05-24: Handover documents signed. One snag left.
site_logs.2025-05-25: Snag clearance done. Project marked complete.
site_logs.2025-05-28: Project officially closed. Exit signage removed.
